title: For your sake our cardamom is packaged to last.For the Earth’s sake, our packaging is now made to not last.
description: Emperor Spices Cardamom is all about goodness. The cardamom in this pack helps alleviate a host of medical conditions and keep you in good health. But there’s more. The pack itself is good for Mother Nature’s health. It is a product of revolutionary Flexzyme technology – made from multi-layered packaging material that
